name: Turo
description:
This was such a fun project to do. A tower defense endless runner mix that doesn't venture too far out the tangents due to time restrictions but certainly proves there is much to be tried yet.

In the game you protect a castle from intruders using turrets but also have the ability to swithc to the mode of an endless runners that runs laps around and helps doing the same as well as increases your high score much faster.
